title: Parkinsons Disease Detection
description: Developed a Parkinsonâ€™s Disease detection system using Swin Transformer for classifying spiraldrawing images, integrated with a React web app and Flutter mobile app for real-time, userfriendly diagnostic predictions

title: GradNet
description: Developed the GradNet app for students to raise academic doubts and post events using Flutter and Firebase.

title: Soil Seive analysis
description: Developed a Soil Sieve Analysis app using Flutter and Firebase, enabling users to test soil based on specific parameters, store their results as reports, and download them as PDFs.

title: College Digitization Portal Website
description: Developed a College Digitization Portal for managing extracurricular activities, enabling students to record their activities and faculty to oversee and manage records

title: Plant Disease Recognition System
description: Developed a plant disease recognition system using CNN to classify diseases in crops. Additionally, built a small agribot that answers queries related to various crops and plants.
